Luwian 提供的手动控制包括曝光、对焦、对焦锁定、变焦和白平衡，以及预设和自定义调整选项、ISO 和快门速度。该应用程序还提供对 40 个滤镜、29 个虚拟 FX、17 个模拟电影和 36 个经典电影色调的访问，这些都可以在主相机面板上轻松使用。

Luwian 是业余和专业摄影师的强大工具，提供一系列功能，使他们能够轻松捕捉令人惊叹的图像。其直观的界面确保用户可以轻松导航应用程序并访问其功能，而其手动控件使他们能够对相机硬件进行精确控制。借助 Luwian，摄影师可以精确、清晰地捕捉他们的视觉，使其成为摄影领域人士的理想工具。

cn.trackName: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验
cn.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

cn.trackName: Whisper Notes - 离线AI语音识别转录成文字
cn.description:
Whisper Notes：基于Whisper AI的离线语音转文字应用，非常适合记录日常语音备忘录和会议笔记。应用完全离线运行，确保您的语音录音和隐私永远不会离开您的设备。

无订阅，无应用内购买，无广告——只需一次性付款，终身使用。

■ 功能特点 
- 本地语音录制和转录 
- 离线导入并转录音频/视频文件
- 批量导出或删除文本和音频文件 
- 支持导出带时间戳的转录文本

■ 为什么我们开发这款应用
有时我做了一个奇怪的梦，想在醒来时记录下来，但睡眼惺忪时打字很困难。我需要一个能够快速捕捉并转录语音的工具。

当朋友发来需要长篇回复的信息，而我正在散步或吃饭时，我希望能快速回复而不必发送语音消息。

■ 常见问题 
1. 它支持录音过程中的实时转录吗？
目前不支持，只能先录音，完成后再转录。

2. 有最大转录长度限制吗？
理论上没有，您可以录制几小时的音频。但由于转录是在您的设备上完成的，速度会有点慢。我测试了大约1小时的音频，转录是准确的。

3. 转录速度如何？
取决于您的设备。在我的iPhone 15上，转录速度约为1:5，意味着5分钟的音频需要约1分钟来转录。

4. 为什么是付费应用且没有免费试用？
我们设计Whisper Notes完全离线运行以保护您的隐私。一旦您下载并打开应用，它就再也不会连接互联网。
提供免费试用需要应用内购买功能，这需要互联网连接—正是我们为了保护您的数据安全而要避免的。

如果您不满意，只需点击右上角的设置按钮找到"申请退款"选项。

5. 为什么不支持AI摘要？
隐私是我们的首要任务。我们绝不会将您的语音录音或转录内容上传到任何AI服务或云服务器。如果您需要摘要，可以随时复制您的转录内容，单独使用您喜欢的AI工具。

6. 支持哪些语言？
英语、中文、德语、西班牙语、俄语、韩语、法语、日语、葡萄牙语、土耳其语、波兰语、加泰罗尼亚语、荷兰语、阿拉伯语、瑞典语、意大利语、印尼语、印地语、芬兰语、越南语、希伯来语、乌克兰语、希腊语、马来语、捷克语、罗马尼亚语、丹麦语、匈牙利语、泰米尔语、挪威语、泰语、乌尔都语、克罗地亚语、保加利亚语、立陶宛语、拉丁语、毛利语、马拉雅拉姆语、威尔士语、斯洛伐克语、泰卢固语、波斯语、拉脱维亚语、孟加拉语、塞尔维亚语、阿塞拜疆语、斯洛文尼亚语、卡纳达语、爱沙尼亚语、马其顿语、布列塔尼语、巴斯克语、冰岛语、亚美尼亚语、尼泊尔语、蒙古语、波斯尼亚语、哈萨克语、阿尔巴尼亚语、斯瓦希里语、加利西亚语、马拉地语、旁遮普语、僧伽罗语、高棉语、绍纳语、约鲁巴语、索马里语、南非语、奥克语、格鲁吉亚语、白俄罗斯语、塔吉克语、信德语、古吉拉特语、阿姆哈拉语、意第绪语、老挝语、乌兹别克语、法罗语、海地克里奥尔语、普什图语、土库曼语、新挪威语、马耳他语、梵语、卢森堡语、缅甸语、藏语、他加禄语、马达加斯加语、阿萨姆语、鞑靼语、夏威夷语、林加拉语、豪萨语、巴什基尔语、爪哇语、巽他语

cn.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
cn.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期

任务管理

•	创建和管理任务

hk.description:
Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

hk.description:
Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again!

Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics.

Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards.

FEATURES
- Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics
- Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon’s Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX
- Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets
- Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade...
- Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivière and legend Yuzo Koshiro
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter"- Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics !

* NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE*

- New co-op moves
- +300 in-game improvements
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter

-MULTIPLAYER UPDATE-

- Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together!
- Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels"

-Mr. X Nightmare DLC-
The fight continues in Wood Oak City.
After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X’s brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. 
With this DLC, get ready for:
• 3 new playable characters
• A new Survival mode with weekly challenges
• Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves
• New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release.

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFicontrollers
- No micro-transactions!

Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go!

If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue, or check our FAQ at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/

Jump, spin and smash your way into the sky as you battle Dr. Eggman with Sonic and his friends! 

Sonic Jump delivers brand new, arcade style adventures. Tilt and tap your way through Story levels and Arcade infinite modes. Visit new and classic Sonic levels for hours of fun. Challenge your friends across the world to see who can jump the farthest.

PLAY WITH SONIC AND FRIENDS
Play as Sonic or his friends Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Rouge, Silver and Blaze.   Master each characters special abilities and attacks!

AMAZING WORLDS
Jump across the legendary Green Hill Zone or take to new worlds including Mountain, Jungle, Blue Sky & Mechanical Zones.

STORY AND ARCADE MODES
Leap through 48 different levels on a quest to stop the evil Dr. Eggman or Jump until you drop in the infinite Arcade Mode.

FUN CHALLENGES AND QUESTS
You gotta go fast to beat each level and win big. Every level and both game modes have special rewards for completing special missions.

UNLOCK POWERFUL ABILITIES 
Collect rings as you play the game, or purchase them in store, to unlock characters, power ups and more.

CHALLENGE THE WORLD
Compete against players across the world to see who can jump highest in Arcade Mode or set epic scores on global leaderboards.

CONSUMER REVIEWS
- 4/4 “Whether you grew up with Sonic or not, Sonic Jump is a total blast.” - Slide to Play

- 4/5 “The story mode and missions are the real draw… giving you a never-ending supply of reasons to keep jumping for the top.” - Digital Spy

- 8/10 “Sonic Jump is an enjoyable little gem that took me by surprise.” - App Gamer

- 4/5 “Sega has made Sonic Jump a proper standalone game well worth it for both fans, and non-fans of Sonic the Hedgehog.” - TouchGen

你是否厭倦了 YouTube 影片中的廣告打擾

全新的 YouTube PlayNav 影片瀏覽器將屏蔽觀看影片時出現的所有侵入式廣告，讓你可以流暢無阻地享受喜愛的影片

• 畫中畫播放：在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片
• 僅音頻模式：在鎖屏狀態下播放任何 YouTube 影片的音頻
• 自動關閉：設置睡眠計時器（Premium）
• 循環模式：自動重複播放你最喜歡的影片（Premium）
• 學習模式：通過字幕學習語言（Premium）

此外，還包括播放清單、速度調整、相關影片、AirPlay 等實用功能，讓你的觀影體驗更上一層樓

如何使用 PlayNav

畫中畫播放（PIP）(Premium)

在使用其他應用時觀看 YouTube 影片。啟用後播放器會縮小到螢幕上，你可以隨意移動或雙擊隱藏它

如何啟用
	1.	播放影片時，點擊左上角的 PIP 圖示（兩個小螢幕圖示）
	2.	影片播放時，從 iPhone 底部向上滑動，播放器將顯示在螢幕上

僅音頻模式

在 iPhone 螢幕鎖定的情況下，收聽你最喜歡的 YouTube 影片音頻。可用於運動、散步或睡前。搭配自動關閉功能，讓你放鬆聆聽喜愛的影片

如何啟用
	1.	啟用畫中畫播放
	2.	然後鎖定 iPhone，音頻將繼續播放

自動關閉

睡覺時間？到 YouTube 選擇你喜歡的影片或播放清單，設置自動關閉計時器，讓你在喜愛的音頻陪伴下入睡

如何啟用
	1.	在播放器中點擊睡眠圖示（月亮）
	2.	選擇自動關閉的時間
	3.	可與僅音頻模式結合使用

循環模式（重複播放影片）

想讓你的影片循環播放嗎？啟用循環模式，讓影片無限循環播放。也可與僅音頻模式結合使用

如何啟用
	1.	點擊重複圖示，影片將持續循環播放，直到你手動關閉

學習模式（通過字幕學習語言）

現在，你可以通過字幕學習語言！啟用學習模式後，你將看到原始字幕和你的語言翻譯。還可以調整播放速度，更好地理解每個單詞

如何啟用
	1.	搜索你學習語言的影片
	2.	影片播放後，點擊標題旁的學習模式按鈕

– 現在試用 PLAYNAV！–

免費享受所有基本功能，並通過一次性購買解鎖 Premium 功能。

最低要求
• iOS 15 或更高版本
• 3G 或更快的網路連接

相關關鍵詞
YouTube、YouTube Music、YouTube Vanced、廣告攔截器、無需訂閱、跳過 YouTube 廣告、無廣告音樂、屏蔽彈窗、YouTube 的 AdBlock、屏蔽彈窗廣告、無廣告內容、高級廣告攔截器、AdBlock Plus、移除廣告、無廣告 YouTube

需要幫助
訪問 playnav.vidiom.app 或聯繫我們 info@playnav.vidiom.app

服務條款 playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service
隱私政策 playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

Jump, spin and smash your way into the sky as you battle Dr. Eggman with Sonic and his friends! 

Sonic Jump delivers brand new, arcade style adventures. Tilt and tap your way through Story levels and Arcade infinite modes. Visit new and classic Sonic levels for hours of fun. Challenge your friends across the world to see who can jump the farthest.

PLAY WITH SONIC AND FRIENDS
Play as Sonic or his friends Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Rouge, Silver and Blaze.   Master each characters special abilities and attacks!

AMAZING WORLDS
Jump across the legendary Green Hill Zone or take to new worlds including Mountain, Jungle, Blue Sky & Mechanical Zones.

STORY AND ARCADE MODES
Leap through 48 different levels on a quest to stop the evil Dr. Eggman or Jump until you drop in the infinite Arcade Mode.

FUN CHALLENGES AND QUESTS
You gotta go fast to beat each level and win big. Every level and both game modes have special rewards for completing special missions.

UNLOCK POWERFUL ABILITIES 
Collect rings as you play the game, or purchase them in store, to unlock characters, power ups and more.

CHALLENGE THE WORLD
Compete against players across the world to see who can jump highest in Arcade Mode or set epic scores on global leaderboards.

CONSUMER REVIEWS
- 4/4 “Whether you grew up with Sonic or not, Sonic Jump is a total blast.” - Slide to Play

- 4/5 “The story mode and missions are the real draw… giving you a never-ending supply of reasons to keep jumping for the top.” - Digital Spy

- 8/10 “Sonic Jump is an enjoyable little gem that took me by surprise.” - App Gamer

- 4/5 “Sega has made Sonic Jump a proper standalone game well worth it for both fans, and non-fans of Sonic the Hedgehog.” - TouchGen

- - - - -

hk.trackName: Be Focused Pro – 專工作學習番茄計時器
hk.releaseNotes:
• Start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button
• Integrate with the Shortcuts app to automate workflow (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
• Trigger Shortcuts automatically on specific events in Be Focused
• Multiple fixes and improvements
hk.description:
專注於任務對於我們這個綁定於螢幕的世代來說是一項真正的挑戰。Be Focused 透過將單個任務分解為不同的時間間隔，並由短暫的休息時間分隔，協助您完成工作。這是一種令人驚訝的有效方法，可保持動力和專注。建立任務、配置休息時間，並在一天、一週或自訂期間內追蹤您的進度。您可以在 iPhone、iPad 或 Mac 上使用 Be Focused — 所有內容都能完美同步。

任務管理

•	建立和管理任務
•	為任務添加備註和截止日期
•	使用標籤和篩選器組織任務
•	從其他應用程式貼上任務清單

計時器控制

•	開始、暫停或跳過間隔
•	自動開始下一個間隔（可選）
•	規劃完成任務所需的間隔並追蹤準確性
•	管理已完成的間隔

計時器自訂

•	設定工作時段、短暫休息和長時間休息的持續時間
•	定義長時間休息前的間隔數量
•	設定每日完成間隔的目標
•	為各個任務分配不同的計時器設定

報告

•	查看詳細報告以監控您的進度
•	將資料匯出為 CSV 格式

聲音與通知

•	可調整頻率的碼錶滴答聲
•	多種鬧鐘聲音
•	互動式通知
•	可調整的鬧鐘和碼錶音量

整合

•	在所有裝置間同步（iPhone、iPad、Mac）*
•	與 Focus Matrix 整合，使用緊急/重要原則管理任務 **
•	與「快捷指令」App 整合，以自動化工作流程

快速存取

•	鎖定畫面和主畫面的小工具
•	鎖定畫面和動態島的即時動態
•	可從鎖定畫面、控制中心或動作按鈕啟動或停止計時器

自動化

•	與「快捷指令」App 整合（透過「快捷指令」App 控制任務和計時器）
•	在 Be Focused App 中基於事件自動執行「快捷指令」

裝置支援

•	支援 Apple Watch
•	也適用於 Mac
•	支援深色和淺色模式

* 與 Mac 同步需要另外購買 Be Focused Pro for macOS。
** 與 Focus Matrix 的整合需要購買 Focus Matrix 的專業版。

Luwian's new cutting-edge Third EYE feature will help you design the perfect frame by quantifying and visualizing where people are likely to look in an image. To activate the Third EYE feature, use the eye button in photography mode.
hk.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

主要面板特點：

曝光控制
對焦+對焦鎖定控制
飛漲
白平衡
國際標準化組織
快門速度
目標網格
全螢幕
方位指示器
目前解析度指示器
手電筒模式：自動/開/關
閃光模式：自動/開/關
相機切換選單
錄影切換按鈕：普通/慢動作/縮時
快門按鈕
視訊錄製按鈕
雙鏡頭錄製模式（僅限 iPhone 11 及更高版本）
真實深度背景相機（僅限 iPhone 11 及更高版本）
快門定時器
手動模式
自動模式
人像模式（僅限 iPhone 11 及更高版本）
類比電影模式
電影色調濾鏡模式
經典濾鏡與視覺特效
選單
盧維安原始魔法精簡版


所有 Raw Magic Lite 功能：

導入/選擇/刪除
媒體 EXIF 資訊和詳細信息
照片編輯裁剪調整大小
影片編輯裁切調整大小（測試版）
照片/影片調整
照片/影片通用濾鏡與視覺特效
照片/影片類比濾鏡
照片/影片電影色調濾鏡


所有設定功能：

照片品質設定
相機預設存取和錄影 FPS 設定
縮時攝影速度 2 倍至 10 倍
開啟和關閉主面板過濾器視圖
快門定時器設定為三秒。至 15 秒。

為了提供給您更好的聆聽體驗，我們正在努力進行一些細微的調整和改進。

• 修復了 CarMode 播放的問題

喜歡 TuneIn 嗎？ 請在 App Store 分享您的評論，讓我們知道。如需技術幫助，請傳送電子郵件至 support@tunein.com。
hk.description:
體育實況。音樂。新聞。播客。

TuneIn 是一個應用程式，它彙集了來自世界各地的實況體育、音樂、新聞、播客和電臺。

只需動動手指即可存取世界上最大的即時、點播和原創音訊庫，聆聽對您來說最重要的訊息，發現讓您感動的新時刻。

透過體育實況、獨家音樂頻道、快速發佈的新聞、全球超過 570 萬個播客和超過 100,000 個廣播電臺，您隨時都能聽到令您驚喜的內容。

TuneIn Premium 使用者可以收聽 Fox News Radio 的無廣告新聞以及各種不間斷的無廣告音樂電臺。

下載 TuneIn 的五大理由：

1.不錯過一場體育賽事實況
您可以在工作場所、家中、健身房和路上聆聽。即時收聽體育講座 - 基本上在任何您可以收聽和點播的地方。

2.聽不完的音樂
永遠不用擔心只能選擇由著名 DJ、有影響力的時尚先鋒和特邀嘉賓策劃的獨家音樂電臺播放的下一首歌曲。發現每個流派的最佳新歌和藝術家，以及您最喜歡的所有歌曲和藝術家。

3.全方位的爆炸性新聞
收聽地方、全國和全球來源 24 小時即時新聞播報，透過 TuneIn Premium 收聽完全沒有廣告的 Fox News。

4.您最喜愛的所有播客
從榜首的節目到新發現的優秀節目，讓自己沉浸在談話的世界中。 關注像經典節目，探索最受歡迎的熱門歌曲，如 The Rachel Maddow 的 Bag Man、The Joe Rogan Experience 和 The Economist。

5.世界上最強大的電臺
您的 FM 撥盤做不到這一點！ 播放世界各地的 100,000+ AM、FM 和網路電臺的節目。 目前流行於 [ ]:[ ]。

不僅僅是在您的 iPhone 上
TuneIn 可在 200 個平台和連接裝置上免費使用。在您鍛煉時透過 Apple Watch 播放音樂。按一下 TuneIn for CarPlay 以便在您駕車回家的路上玩遊戲。透過 Google Home、Amazon Echo 和 Alexa 讓您的播客伴您左右。


升級到 TuneIn Premium 獲得完整的體驗
• 無廣告音樂
• 無廣告新聞
• 今天的最佳播客
• 100,000 個電臺


透過應用程式訂閱 TuneIn Radio Premium。如果您選擇訂閱，則將根據您所在的國家/地區按月收取訂閱費。在您完成付款之前，訂閱費將顯示在應用程式中。您的訂閱將按當時的訂閱費每月自動續訂，除非在目前訂閱期結束前至少 24 小時關閉自動續訂。您的 iTunes 帳戶將在目前時段結束前 24 小時內自動扣費。訂閱費將按月收取。您可以隨時透過 iTunes 帳戶設定關閉自動續訂。

隱私政策：http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/
使用條款：http://tunein.com/policies/

TuneIn 使用 Nielsen 測量軟體，該軟體使您能夠為諸如 Nielsen 的 TV Ratings 等市場研究做貢獻。要瞭解關於 Neilsen 的產品和您的隱私的更多資訊，請瀏覽 http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy。

mo.description:
Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again!

Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics.

Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards.

FEATURES
- Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics
- Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon’s Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX
- Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets
- Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade...

mo.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

遊戲特色

指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。準備好發動英勇的攻擊，堅守陣地，拯救平民，潛入超級計算機和各種英雄的物品。每個任務需要新的戰術和行動才能取得勝利。

通過17次終結式特別行動的戰術規則測試你的機智。每個關卡通過傷痕銘記挑戰。諒你也不敢。

解鎖不可能模式。僅對大無畏敢死隊開放。諒你絕對不敢。

在史詩戰鬥中擊敗巨大而非凡的頭目。這些頭目卑鄙而異常地巨大，他們決心要將你碾碎。鋼鐵戰隊，整裝待發！

40+升級以提升你的戰略，同時授予你的部隊防禦無人機，凝固汽油彈火箭，反彈爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

14位具有出色能力的英雄聽從你的調遣。將他們訓練到極致出色，否則惹惱他們後果自負。

8種可向敵人發動進攻的特種武器，讓你的戰術更加具有深度。還有什麼比得上一個瞄準了的導彈？對50枚高爆炸炸彈的軌道炮襲擊！

完成70+成就中的任何成就，贏得你應得的獎勵

選擇你的遊戲困難模式，找到屬於你的公平挑戰：休閒，普通或老兵別太狂妄了要么狂妄一點你自己決定！！

mo.trackName: Be Focused Pro – 專工作學習番茄計時器
mo.releaseNotes:
• Start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button
• Integrate with the Shortcuts app to automate workflow (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
• Trigger Shortcuts automatically on specific events in Be Focused
• Multiple fixes and improvements
mo.description:
專注於任務對於我們這個綁定於螢幕的世代來說是一項真正的挑戰。Be Focused 透過將單個任務分解為不同的時間間隔，並由短暫的休息時間分隔，協助您完成工作。這是一種令人驚訝的有效方法，可保持動力和專注。建立任務、配置休息時間，並在一天、一週或自訂期間內追蹤您的進度。您可以在 iPhone、iPad 或 Mac 上使用 Be Focused — 所有內容都能完美同步。

任務管理

•	建立和管理任務
•	為任務添加備註和截止日期
•	使用標籤和篩選器組織任務
•	從其他應用程式貼上任務清單

計時器控制

•	開始、暫停或跳過間隔
•	自動開始下一個間隔（可選）
•	規劃完成任務所需的間隔並追蹤準確性
•	管理已完成的間隔

計時器自訂

•	設定工作時段、短暫休息和長時間休息的持續時間
•	定義長時間休息前的間隔數量
•	設定每日完成間隔的目標
•	為各個任務分配不同的計時器設定

報告

•	查看詳細報告以監控您的進度
•	將資料匯出為 CSV 格式

聲音與通知

•	可調整頻率的碼錶滴答聲
•	多種鬧鐘聲音
•	互動式通知
•	可調整的鬧鐘和碼錶音量

整合

•	在所有裝置間同步（iPhone、iPad、Mac）*
•	與 Focus Matrix 整合，使用緊急/重要原則管理任務 **
•	與「快捷指令」App 整合，以自動化工作流程

快速存取

•	鎖定畫面和主畫面的小工具
•	鎖定畫面和動態島的即時動態
•	可從鎖定畫面、控制中心或動作按鈕啟動或停止計時器

自動化

•	與「快捷指令」App 整合（透過「快捷指令」App 控制任務和計時器）
•	在 Be Focused App 中基於事件自動執行「快捷指令」

裝置支援

•	支援 Apple Watch
•	也適用於 Mac
•	支援深色和淺色模式

* 與 Mac 同步需要另外購買 Be Focused Pro for macOS。
** 與 Focus Matrix 的整合需要購買 Focus Matrix 的專業版。

mo.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

主要面板特點：

曝光控制

tw.trackName: Lanota - 動感節奏音樂遊戲
tw.releaseNotes:
3.0.4版更新內容：
1) 升級遊戲引擎，多數檔案需要重新下載，可於標題畫面管理下載中清除舊資料並重新下載
tw.description:
用悠揚樂聲拯救世界，全新體驗的繪本風角色扮演音樂遊戲！
扮演主角探索地圖，以音樂遊戲進行「調律」，讓黑白無聲的世界恢復生機。
隨著劇情演進，逐步解鎖遊玩多樣風格的樂曲，享受令人震撼的boss關卡演出，與欣賞精美的繪本故事！

《獎項與成就》

2016 國際行動遊戲大獎 1st IMGA SEA「最佳音樂音效獎 Excellence in Audio」
2016 GAME STAR遊戲之星票選Taiwan Indie Game項目金獎
2017 台北國際電玩展 獨立遊戲獎 Indie Game Award 「最佳音樂音效獎 Best Audio」
2017 13th IMGA Global 入圍
2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia 「最佳行動遊戲 Best Mobile Game」 入圍

《遊戲特色》

>> 新穎動感的音樂遊戲

獨創多變的盤面動畫，隨著音樂節奏點擊滑動，遊玩數十位作曲家創作的高品質樂曲，和觀看魄力十足的boss關卡特別演出。我們為音樂遊戲的初學者到專業玩家分別打造適合的難易度與挑戰課題，鍛鍊自己的實力同時解鎖隱藏要素吧！

>> 精緻迷人的繪本故事

「我相信，受音律眷顧的你一定可以恢復世界原本的秩序。」
當各地點的紊亂能量藉由「調律」恢復秩序，世界原本的姿態也逐漸展現在眼前。在地圖上逐步探索未知的地點，欣賞豐富故事文本與精心繪製的繪本插畫，途中發現的道具就像是旅行的紀念品。

>> 排行榜、成就、成績分享與存檔

收集劇情相關的任務成就，向好友分享成績結算畫面，並在排行榜上與全世界音樂遊戲好手競爭。遊戲支援雲端存檔。

《官方連結》

官方網站：http://noxygames.com/lanota/
隱私權政策與服務條款：https://noxygames.com/lanota/privacy.html

在Facebook追蹤我們：https://www.facebook.com/lanota/
Twitter: @Noxy_Lanota  /  @Noxy_Lanota_EN
Discord: https://discord.gg/lanota

tw.trackName: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验
tw.releaseNotes:
本次更新：
1.优化了赛博护士的对话体验
tw.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

tw.description:
Apple 年度最佳應用程式 Day One，全球下載次數超過 1,500 萬次，獲得 200,000 次 5 星評價，徹底改變了寫日記的方式，讓你記錄生活中的點點滴滴。  在全球最值得信賴的數位日記中安全地儲存音訊、影片、照片、筆記等其他內容。

「Day One 創造珍貴的回憶，近乎完美：完全隱密的數位空間。」 –《紐約時報》

「Day One 讓寫日記變得輕鬆愉快。」 – 《連線》

「這款優異的日記應用程式賞心悅目、簡單好用，讓競爭對手難以超越。」–《Macworld》

為什麼選擇 Day One？

Day One 是原創日記應用程式。十年來持續更新並增添功能，打造全球最隱密、最值得信賴，也最好用的日記平台。

簡單好用，讓人著迷

• 獲獎設計，美觀大方
• 無限文本條目
• 無限量照片和影片*
•強大的 RTF 文字格式與 Markdown
• 記錄生活點滴的全新方式*

私密又安全

• 自動備份，妥善保護日記條目
• 端對端加密，100% 確保日記隱密
•透過密碼或 TouchID 保障日記條目安全
•提供多種匯出選項 (pdf、純文字、JSON 等)，確保日記條目永遠歸你所有

養成並保持習慣

•可設定的提醒通知
• 每日不重覆的日記提示，消除你的撰寫障礙
•可自訂範本讓你省下時間，並讓版面看起來井井有條
• 今日檢視讓你快速查看今天去過哪些地方、做了哪些事

隨時隨地寫日記

• 跨平台應用程式，可在 iPhone、Apple Watch、iPad 和 Mac 上使用
• 可透過電子郵件直接傳送條目到日記中

專為記錄回憶打造

• 「在這一天」功能讓你重溫過往回憶
• 標籤、我的最愛和搜尋篩選條件讓你輕鬆找到所需內容
• 「地圖檢視」讓你快速查看已記錄的所有地點

*Day One 是款提供使用者永久免費使用的應用程式，完全不限條目數量。 Day One Premium 會員另可享有無限量照片、影片及同步功能。 立即開始免費試用。

隱私權政策：https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/

使用條款：https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/

如需技術協助或有其他問題，請前往：https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

https://www.badoo.com/privacy 
https://badoo.com/terms

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

us.description:
The best interactive app for learning musculoskeletal anatomy. 

AnatomyMapp® combines an empowering collection of study tools for the popular Trail Guide to the Body—a best-selling musculoskeletal anatomy textbook—into a single interactive app! It's great for not only reinforcing your textbook learning but also for studying while on the bus, having a snack, or pretty much wherever you have your phone.
 
AnatomyMapp® includes information from all 362 Trail Guide to the Body Flashcards; questions from the Trail Guide to the Body Student Workbook; and easy search and bookmarking capabilities:

• Test your musculoskeletal anatomy knowledge by (1) answering multiple choice question (muscle cards only); (2) locating specific structures; or (3) identifying actions, origins, insertions, and nerve innervations (AOIN).

• Bookmark specific cards to review later and use enhanced navigation features for bookmarked cards.

• Apply the easy search function to choose all cards or only cards you’ve bookmarked.

• Find additional information in the Trail Guide to the Body textbook with page references on each card.

• Zoom into cards to enhance your view of the illustrations.

• Learn correct pronunciation using the app’s audio pronunciation.
 
Designed to be viewed in portrait mode. 
 
If you have any comments or suggestions, we’d like to hear from you at info@booksofdiscovery.com.
 
More than 2,000 manual therapy programs have chosen Trail Guide to the Body products for their students. The textbook is sold in nearly 40 countries.
 
AnatomyMapp® is a registered trademark of Books of Discovery. Learn more at booksofdiscovery.com.

us.description:
In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. 

Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. 

Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. 

It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ...

--------------------------------------------------------
In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters.

Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave...

Game Features
·Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time!                     
·Hundreds of monsters to defeat!
·Hundreds of equipment to collect!
·Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer!
·Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore!

Contact us
cs.thegreedycave@avalongames.com
https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images.

The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel.

Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography.

us.description:
Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

us.description:
Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again!

Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics.

Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards.

FEATURES
- Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics
- Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon’s Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX
- Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets
- Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade...
- Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivière and legend Yuzo Koshiro
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter"- Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics !

* NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE*

- New co-op moves
- +300 in-game improvements
- Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare)
- New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter

-MULTIPLAYER UPDATE-

- Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together!
- Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels"

-Mr. X Nightmare DLC-
The fight continues in Wood Oak City.
After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X’s brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. 
With this DLC, get ready for:
• 3 new playable characters
• A new Survival mode with weekly challenges
• Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves
• New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release.

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFicontrollers
- No micro-transactions!

Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go!

If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue, or check our FAQ at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/

us.description:
Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos?

The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions.

Plus, our app offers features you’ll love:
• On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps.
• Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked.
• Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium)
• Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos.
• Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium)

It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience.

» HOW TO USE PLAYNAV?

ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium)

Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap.

» How to activate it?
1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons).
2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen.

AUDIO-ONLY MODE

Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos!

» How to activate it?
1. Enable On-Screen Playback.
2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing.

AUTO SHUTDOWN

Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep.

» How to activate it?
1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player.
2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown.
3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode.

LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO)

Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode.

» How to activate it?
1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it.

LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE)

Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word.

» How to activate it?
1 Search for videos in the language you are learning.
2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title.

– TRY PLAYNAV NOW! –
Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase.

Minimum requirements:
• iOS 15 or higher.
• 3G connection or higher.

» Related keywords:
YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads.

us.description:
Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It’s a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac — everything stays perfectly in sync.

Task Management

•	Create and manage tasks
•	Add notes and due dates to tasks
•	Organize tasks with tags and filters
•	Paste task lists from other apps

Timer Control

•	Start, pause, or skip intervals
•	Auto-start the next interval (optionally)
•	Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy
•	Manage completed intervals

Timer Customization

•	Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks
•	Define number of intervals before a long break
•	Set a daily goal for completed intervals 
•	Assign different timer settings to individual tasks

Reports

•	View detailed reports to monitor your progress
•	Export your data in CSV format

Sounds and Notifications

•	Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency
•	Variety of alarm sounds
•	Interactive notifications
•	Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer

Integration

•	Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) *
•	Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle **
•	Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow

Quick Access

•	Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island
•	Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button

Automation

•	Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app

Device Support

•	Also available for Mac
•	Dark and Light mode support

* Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately.
** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.

us.description:
Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images.

The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel.

Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography.

us.description:
● Game overview
Following on from the Aladdin X projector and Nintendo Switch versions, as the third step, we have now officially released a smartphone version.
The rules are simple. It's a game where you combine two small fruits to make a bigger one and work towards making a watermelon. You must be careful that the fruits do not overflow from the box as you keep scoring points and aim to get a high score. When two fruits of the same type hit each other, the fruit type “evolves.” Then, when you hit two watermelons against each other...!? 
The ranking is updated every day! Have fun aiming for the top ranking!

● How to play the game
1. When fruits of the same type hit each other, they “evolve” into the next size of fruit and the score increases.
2. Use your finger to move Poppy to the left and right and then take your finger off the screen to drop the fruit. You can also tap anywhere in the box to drop the fruit to that specific location.
3. The game ends if the fruit overflows from the box.

● Notice
Official information on the Suika Game is available here.
Official Suika Game Website: https://suikagame.jp/

tr.description:
Can you stop the Insurgency? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique and deeply engaging political/military strategic simulation. 

The war is ‘over’ - but we all know that doesn’t mean anything. To stabilise the country, you need to balance military and civilian priorities to win the hearts and minds of the people, whilst also stopping insurgents from seizing power!

Rebel Inc. is the brand new game from the creator of ‘Plague Inc.’ - one of the most popular paid games ever with over 130 million players. Brilliantly executed with beautiful graphics and critically acclaimed gameplay - Rebel Inc. offers a deeply engaging, strategic challenge inspired by the complexities and consequences of modern counter insurgency.

◈◈◈ #1 top paid game globally ◈◈◈

▶ “Rebel Inc. lets everyone wrestle with the messy challenges of post-conflict recovery and better understand the complex realities of building peace.” - World Bank Global Lead for Stability, Peace and Security
▶ "Highly rewarding spiritual sequel to one of the App Store's biggest hits." - Pocket Tactics
▶ "Surprisingly sophisticated... even better than some of the stabilization training software I have seen in government use" - PAXsims
▶ "Rebel Inc. is fascinating and fun" - 148Apps.com
▶ "Another great game and a worthy successor to Plague Inc" - App Store review
▶ "If you love strategy games then this is the game for you" - App Store review
▶ "Brilliant game, the gameplay is interesting and the strategy is intuitive!" - App Store review
▶ "Unlike anything I’ve played on here before" - App Store review

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stabilise 9 richly modeled regions
● Innovative representation of counter insurgency tactics 
● Fund realistic initiatives to empower the local government
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world based on extensive research
● Intelligent strategic and tactical AI
● Sophisticated narrative algorithms shaped by your decisions
● 8 unique governors with radically different abilities
● Conduct large-scale Operations in Campaign mode
● Play new generated Challenges every week
● 13 Official Scenarios including disease outbreaks, helicopters and advanced insurgents
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system
● Full Save/Load functionality
● Internet connectivity not required

An important note:
Although a fictional game, Rebel Inc. looks at important real world issues and we have made every effort to deal with them sensitively. The game has been extensively researched and has been developed in cooperation with leading regional politicians, business people and journalists as well as international charities, experts and governments.

Rebel Inc. is now fully localised in English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), and Russian.

Special sale price to celebrate the launch of the game!

◈◈◈

I’ve got lots of plans for updates! Get in touch and let me know what you want to see.
James (the designer)

www.ndemiccreations.com/en/1-support

不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

tr.description:
Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

tr.description:
Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again!

Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics.

Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards.

FEATURES
- Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics
- Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon’s Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX
- Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets
- Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade...
- Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivière and legend Yuzo Koshiro
- Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics !

- New co-op moves

- Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels"

After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X’s brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing.

tr.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月

4.生辰App 会员协议

tr.description:
Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos?

The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions.

Plus, our app offers features you’ll love:
• On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps.
• Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked.
• Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium)
• Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. (Premium)
• Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium)

It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience.

» HOW TO USE PLAYNAV?

ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium)

Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap.

» How to activate it?
1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons).
2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen.

AUDIO-ONLY MODE

Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos!

» How to activate it?
1. Enable On-Screen Playback.
2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing.

AUTO SHUTDOWN

Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep.

» How to activate it?
1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player.
2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown.
3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode.

LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO)

Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode.

» How to activate it?
1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it.

LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE)

Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word.

» How to activate it?
1 Search for videos in the language you are learning.
2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title.

– TRY PLAYNAV NOW! –
Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase.

Minimum requirements:
• iOS 15 or higher.
• 3G connection or higher.

YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads.

tr.description:
Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It’s a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac — everything stays perfectly in sync.

Task Management

•	Create and manage tasks
•	Add notes and due dates to tasks
•	Organize tasks with tags and filters
•	Paste task lists from other apps

Timer Control

•	Start, pause, or skip intervals
•	Auto-start the next interval (optionally)
•	Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy
•	Manage completed intervals

Timer Customization

•	Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks
•	Define number of intervals before a long break
•	Set a daily goal for completed intervals 
•	Assign different timer settings to individual tasks

Reports

•	View detailed reports to monitor your progress
•	Export your data in CSV format

Sounds and Notifications

•	Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency
•	Variety of alarm sounds
•	Interactive notifications
•	Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer

Integration

•	Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) *
•	Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle **
•	Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow

Quick Access

•	Widgets for Lock Screen and Home Screen
•	Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island
•	Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button

Automation

•	Integration with Shortcuts app (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app)
•	Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app

Device Support

•	Apple Watch support
•	Also available for Mac
•	Dark and Light mode support

* Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately.
** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.

tr.description:
Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images.

The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel.

Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography.

tr.description:
Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together.

Benefits of Premium version:
- Unique pet Raven
- Starter Kit
- Caches of useful items in shelters
- Expanded selection of perks
- Chat without any limitations
- Reduced waiting time between parcels
- Access to all kinds and colors of map markers

Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. 

It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies – you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. 

- Hardcore survival:
Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax.

- Realistic world:
The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness!

- A lot of opportunities:
Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition.

- People and stories:
Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world.

- Improve your skills:
Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others.

- Cooperative mode:
The Online mode  with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game.

Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials.
Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! 

Features: 
- Сraft system – get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! 
- Hardcore simulator of survival 
- Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode 
- Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online
War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other.

User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en
